tests.name: FTPClient.Put
tests.setup: if [ ! -f ".built" ]; then (     touch .built &&     rm -rf test_classroom &&     rm -rf build &&     git clone https://github.com/N2Sys-EDU/2023-lab1-myFTP-Test.git test_classroom &&     cd ./test_classroom &&     mkdir -p build &&     cd build &&     cmake .. &&     make &&     cd ../../ &&     mkdir -p build &&     cp ./test_classroom/ftp_client_std ./build &&     cp ./test_classroom/ftp_server_std ./build &&     cp ./test_classroom/build/ftp_test ./build &&     cd ./build &&     cmake .. &&     make &&     cd ../) fi
